sentence.Network_en: He remained for some years avowedly radical in his political outlook.
sentence.Network_cn: 他多年来保持公然激进的政治观。

sentence.Network_en: He was avowedly in the wrong.
Their policy has been avowedly marxist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的政策被公开地宣称为马克思主义政策.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... avowed 自认的 avowedly 公然地 avowry 声明.

list.abs: Nowadays , resemble peddling avowedly on Internet so the net shop of contraband is not little ., 如今 , 像这样在互联网上公然叫卖走私货的网店不少.

list.exp: 长辈 眷顾 关怀
list.abs: avowedavowedly avuncular 长辈眷顾关怀avuncular tone 长辈口气-　 Awd Awg 　await 等候等待期望进待盼.

entry.def: If you are an avowed supporter or opponent of something, you have declared that you support it or oppose it.

example.tran: 她宣称是个素食主义者。

entry.def: An avowed belief or aim is one that you have declared formally or publicly.

example.ex: ...the council's avowed intention to stamp on racism.
example.tran: 理事会宣布要消灭种族歧视

sentences.sentence: "Susan Smith was professedly guilty of the murders"
"true, she is the smartest in her class"

auth_sentence.content: Consider all that affair, yet I stand avowedly atheist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Consider all that affair, yet I stand avowedly atheist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consider all that affair, yet I stand avowedly atheist.

auth_sentence.content: So I am, avowedly, trying to find an argument.
auth_sentence.res_content: So I am, avowedly, trying to find an argument.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So I am, avowedly, trying to find an argument.

auth_sentence.content: Labour's avowedly left-wing manifesto and unilateralist defence policy played into Conservative hands.
auth_sentence.res_content: Labour's avowedly left-wing manifesto and unilateralist defence policy played into Conservative hands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Labour's avowedly left-wing manifesto and unilateralist defence policy played into Conservative hands.
